attributes.action: I am asking for Nigel Farage to be appointed as Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: Given the state of this country is in. I am asking for Nigel Farage to be appointed as Prime Minister. He is the only person with the heart & sole to sort out all the mess currently.
attributes.background: Given the state of this country is in. I am asking for Nigel Farage to be appointed as Prime Minister. He is the only person with the heart & sole to sort out all the mess currently.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
